config.enableMod.name: Enable mod
config.enableMod.tooltip: Master switch for random monster ambushes.
config.checkInterval.name: Check interval (ticks)
config.checkInterval.tooltip: How often the mod checks for an ambush. 60 ticks = 1 second.
config.maxMonsters.name: Max monsters per ambush
config.maxMonsters.tooltip: Upper limit on how many monsters spawn at once.
config.minDistance.name: Minimum spawn distance
config.minDistance.tooltip: Closest monsters are allowed to spawn from the player (in tiles).
config.maxDistance.name: Maximum spawn distance
config.maxDistance.tooltip: Furthest monsters are allowed to spawn from the player (in tiles).
config.spawnChance.name: Ambush chance
config.spawnChance.tooltip: Chance (0–1) that an ambush happens when a check runs.
config.allowDaytime.name: Allow daytime ambushes
config.allowDaytime.tooltip: If disabled, ambushes only happen after 6:00 PM.
config.skipEvents.name: Skip during events & festivals
config.skipEvents.tooltip: If enabled, ambushes are disabled during events and festivals.
config.enableBoss.name: Enable boss ambushes
config.enableBoss.tooltip: If enabled, some ambushes will contain one tougher boss monster.
config.bossChance.name: Boss ambush chance
config.bossChance.tooltip: Chance (0–1) that a successful ambush becomes a boss ambush.
config.bossHealthMult.name: Boss health multiplier
config.bossHealthMult.tooltip: How much to multiply boss HP. 2.0 means double health.
config.bossDamageMult.name: Boss damage multiplier
config.bossDamageMult.tooltip: How much to multiply boss damage. 2.0 means double damage.
